nodes.text: In the year 0 ABY, a male gunman, along with his partner, attempted to use his blaster to kill Emperor's Hand Mara Jade, who was preparing to execute Imperial Judge Lamos Chatoor. However, Jade killed the gunman and his partner when she redirected their blaster bolts back at them with her lightsaber. Shortly thereafter, Jade killed Judge Chatoor as well.
The male gunman first appeared in the 2011 novel Choices of One, written by Timothy Zahn.
